definition: to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)

sentences.english: There’s no getting away from it, if you’re Irish.
sentences.chinese: 只要你做了爱尔兰人，你是没法摆脱它的。

sentences.english: It will accompany a smile to Irish eyes in particular"."
sentences.chinese: 该裁定将特别令爱尔兰人喜上眉梢。

sentences.english: The Irish began by dividing the island into North and South and setting up a distillery.
sentences.chinese: 爱尔兰人通过划分海岛成南北和设定槽坊开始了。

sentences.english: The audience burst into laughter at his reference to a people who are well-known raconteurs and often the butt of jokes.
sentences.chinese: 众所周知，善谈的爱尔兰人经常被拿来当笑柄。

sentences.english: The Irish were soon almost wholly dependent on the potato as their food staple.
sentences.chinese: 爱尔兰人很快就几乎完全依靠马铃薯作为他们的主食。

sentences.english: The Irish remained in small bands during the early Middle Ages.
sentences.chinese: 在中古时代初期，爱尔兰人只剩下少数的聚落。

sentences.english: Are the Chinese more generous than the Irish?
sentences.chinese: 中国人比爱尔兰人更古道热肠？

sentences.english: I thanked the Irish for filling that space with the miracle of peace.
sentences.chinese: 我感谢爱尔兰人用和平的奇迹填充了这一空间。

sentences.english: The Irish are very found of music and poems.
sentences.chinese: 爱尔兰人非常喜欢音乐和诗。

sentences.english: O'Brien's the Irish guy over there.
sentences.chinese: 欧布莱曼是这里唯一的爱尔兰人。

sentences.english: Let's suppose that your great-great-great grandfather was Irish.
sentences.chinese: 让我们来假设你的太太太祖父是爱尔兰人。

sentences.english: The big Irishman with the Immigration badge looked at him.
sentences.chinese: 那个带着移民局证章的大个子爱尔兰人瞧着他。

sentences.english: I can't believe how meekly the Irish boys took the loss.
sentences.chinese: 我不相信爱尔兰人能唾面自干的接受这个结果。

sentences.english: So, Irishman was forced to sail to the Africa and continue his plundering.
sentences.chinese: 因此，爱尔兰人被迫驶往非洲，并继续他的掠夺。

sentences.english: It will bring a smile to Irish eyes in particular"."
sentences.chinese: 该裁定将特别令爱尔兰人喜上眉梢。

sentences.english: Two Irishmen , who newly arrived in America, decided to try their luck in one of the restaurants.
sentences.chinese: 两个刚到美国的爱尔兰人决定到一家餐馆试试运气。

pinyin: Ang4 ge2 lu3 Sa1 ke4 xun4
